links.title: ArcelorMittal announces cash tender offer
links.description: ArcelorMittal starts a cash tender offer to purchase up to €1.25B of its bonds.It includes: €750M of 3.125% notes outstanding due 2022 at a fixed price of 103.6% and €500M of 0.95% notes due 2023 at a fixed price of 99.8%.Tender offer set to expire on Oct.

Fluorspar Mining Efforts Picking Up Pace as Steady Demand for Fluorite Material Rises  $WWR $CLF $LAC $MT 

https://newsfilter.io/a/c3edb39f764fa21035e6e628b6075d06

links.title: Fluorspar Mining Efforts Picking Up Pace as Steady Demand for Fluorite Material Rises
links.description: PALM BEACH, Fla., Oct. 5, 2020 /PRNewswire/ -- The global fluorspar market is poised to exhibit significant growth through 2030. Fluorite is also more commonly known as fluorspar. Fluorite is immensely popular in the jewelry sector for its cubic design and its various colors such as blue, yellow, purple, and green, and it is famous as a fluorescent mineral.
